title: Chaos Fortress Under Attack: Empire vs Warriors of Chaos - Total War: WARHAMMER Gameplay
description:
Today we are looking at a custom map called Chaos Fortress.  It looks all evil and has floating stuff! COOL.  The Empire has rallied a great army to bring the war to the warriors of Chaos.  This battle seems to be one sided, but the ending is unbelievable.  Enjoy the battle :D

BATTLE STARTS AT: 4:51

The game we are playing is called Total War: Warhammer! 


If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
